docs.text: the film starts out with a creepy opening sequence to which has the now classic and creepy score by writer/director/producer john carpenter who in my mind is a brilliant director , he really is .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he wrote this film , he directed this film , he produced this film and he made the excessively creepy score to this film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i think he is and always will be famous for this classic which after 21 years has not lost it's popularity or it's ability to scare the wits out of people .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i think i have seen 'halloween' over 100 times and each time i find something new and brilliant , and each time i am scared even though i know what is going to happen .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i own three different versions of the film : a vhs regular version that came with a limited edition 20th anniversary t-shirt , a boxed edition vhs in a hardcover case digitally re-mastered with the original theatrical widescreen presentation , in a nifty plastic picture decorated box with a numbered snow-globe .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in other words i am completely and utterly obsessed with the film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it has changed horror movies forever and spawned six sequels with only 2 , 4 , and 7 being truly good .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it also spawned several cheap imitations of the film that were offensive in some ways to a true halloween fan .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: since i heard about halloween being released on dvd in a limited edition of 30 , 000 copies , i knew i had to buy one no matter what !
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i did and man to me it's the best dvd ever manufactured with the brilliance of the film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: no words can describe the dvd .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in 'halloween' michael myers is a evil person whom killed his sister in cold blood 16 years ago in 1963 .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: now in 1978 grown up and in a mental hospital michael myers escapes to go back to his hometown of haddonfield , illinois , followed by his past doctor sam loomis .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the person michael is targeting is laurie strode who is played by jamie lee curtis in her film debut .

docs.text: why is he stalking her ?

docs.text: check out halloween ii it explains it all .

docs.text: on this unholy night on october 31 , 1978 laurie strode and her two friends are going to have the time of their lives , which is trying to stay alive .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the whole film is filled with terrifying moments most coming from just seeing michael myers walk .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: nick castle who played the shape in the first movie did an incredible job , and no other person in any other halloween flick can do what he did .

docs.text: what john carpenter did in 1978 is made a ground-breaking new film , with scares , wit , and style .

docs.text: no other movie or sequel has lived up to this one , and in my opinion never will .
